mapper.insert: insert into user ( user_name, user_password, user_phone, user_gender, user_type )values( #{userName}, #{userPassword}, #{userPhone}, #{userGender}, #{userType} )

insert into volunteer( user_id, volunteer_name, volunteer_gender, volunteer_age, volunteer_address, volunteer_phone, volunteer_image )values ( #{userId}, #{volunteerName}, #{volunteerGender}, #{volunteerAge}, #{volunteerAddress}, #{volunteerPhone}, #{volunteerImage} );
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM animal WHERE give_title LIKE concat('%',#{text},'%') limit #{start},#{rows};
